title: Work
lyrics:
6 ContributorsWork Lyrics[Verse]
These motherfuckers can feel that the storm is comin'
I’ve been broke to the point that I couldn’t afford to hustle
If you listen to my music you're welcome to join the struggle
I got the weight of the whole world on my shoulders
I’m building muscle!
Take a look into my eyes and you can see the ambition
I’m feelin' imprisoned, it’s obvious to see you don’t get it
I think it’s time for you to really start readin' my lyrics
And you can see that I’m a whole different breed and appearance
Don’t need a reason to kill it, motherfucker I just do it
If opportunity knocks at my door, I run through it
This a whole another level of hustle, so fuck you
If you don’t play this shit at night all alone and get drunk to it
Gotta conquer and divide and put your heart on the line
I’ll never work a 9-5, bitch I want what is mine
That’s the difference, I’ll never be a slave to the system
And you ain't ballin' dawg your momma had to pay your tuition
I’m throwin' molotov’s at all of y’all, I play my position
I put this blade to your face 'til my name is imprinted
It cuts deep, you should probably give the surgeon a call
'Cause every word and every bar leaves a permanent scar
Back on a hiatus, old school like Miles Davis
Told my grandpa stick around I promise you won't make it
It’s been a long time since I felt calm and collected
And to be honest it’s been fuckin' with my confidence levels
When I was little I was convinced that I am the devil
Now the devil is my bitch wearin' five inch stilettos
Put in workin' so long, it feels like I need a medal
Got these rappers on my strings, I feel like I am Geppetto
I work harder!
You might also like[Chorus]
Yeah, you did a little work
But you haven't done half as much as Merk, word
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you got your name on your shirt
But you gotta put your time in first, bitch
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you did a couple shows
But you never spent a year on a road, no
(I work harder!)
I talk about the shit I live
While you're say it but you never really did, bitch
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you did a little work
But you haven't done half as much as Merk, bitch
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you got your name on your shirt
But you gotta put your time in first, word
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you did a couple shows
But you never spent a year on a road, no
(I work harder!)
I talk about the shit I live
While you're sayin' it but you never really did, bitch
(I work harder!)
[Verse 2]
Fall off, I ain't lettin' it happen
My fan base keeps growin', you could never surpass it
You bet that I'm snappin', I'm laughin' at these veteran rappers
I'm goin' psycho, don't let me near the medicine cabinet
I kept it humble but I noticed I was stayin' too quiet
I'm breakin' the silence, I'm fightin' with this hatred inside me
So if you pressin' on my nerves then I may catch a body
So hate if you want and then I'll show up and spray up the party
I'm in a pissed off, get lost, kick rocks mood
So if you shit talk, I hit jaws and kill all you
Let a clip off and lick shots at hip hop dudes
Cut off your lip gloss with jigsaws and spit on you
I'm on my savage shit
Hazardous to these rapper kids who think they dope
When they whack as shit
I dealt the cards I was given, I ain't asked for this
I ain't that convinced what you rap you actually did
No one's fuckin' with me, put 'em in front of me please
And you gonna watch me turn the heat up to a 100 degrees
I'm in love with revenge, I'm in love with the street
You can all go home now there's nothin' to see
I work harder!

[Chorus]
Yeah, you did a little work
But you haven't done half as much as Merk, word
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you got your name on your shirt
But you gotta put your time in first, bitch
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you did a couple shows
But you never spent a year on a road, no
(I work harder!)
I talk about the shit I live
While you're say it but you never really did, bitch
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you did a little work
But you haven't done half as much as Merk, bitch
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you got your name on your shirt
But you gotta put your time in first, word
(I work harder!)
Yeah, you did a couple shows
But you never spent a year on a road, no
(I work harder!)
I talk about the shit I live
While you're sayin' it but you never really did, bitch
(I work harder!)Embed
